title: Understanding and Applying a Multi-Metric Framework for EFL Teacher Classroom Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learner role and domain expertise unspecified; no prior experience with AI-based assessment tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core dimensions of EFL class evaluation (instructional design, materials, teaching methods, effectiveness, and classroom management)
Learners can evaluate 15 detailed indicators (pronunciation, content delivery, learning objective achievement, etc.) by analyzing class video/audio materials
One can describe the operational principles and utilization strategies of an AI-based multi-metric assessment system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
